def: This occurs when someone gives up something in return for something else. EG A business exchanges a product for money.
Something that needs to be fulfilled for us to survive.
Something we would like to satisfy our needs.
Someone who buys a product from a business
Someone who uses goods and services produced by businesses
Measures the number of items sold
When a market is divided into different groups of needs and wants
The process of gathering and analysing and processing data relevant to marketing decisions.
A group of buyers with similar needs within the overall market
Uses data gathered for the first time
Uses data that has been gathered already
All the activities influencing whether or not a customer buys a product. The elements of the mix can be analysed using the four Ps.
Where a business must consider the price of a product or service
How and where a business will advertise their products and services
How and where products and services will be distributed
All decisions related to the design and specification of the product are considered in this part of the Marketing Mix.
